name: Kápou Alloú
description:
A charming adventure game following a child's adventure through a dangerous forest. 

Travel between reality and fantasy realms in order to reach the end of the forest and return your character to safety.

Controls

Arrow Keys - Motion (left, right, jump)

'X' Key - change realms

Credits

Revolving Around Us - Ketsa (YouTube creator library)

Swoosh sound effect (YouTube creator library)

Footsteps, woodlan, forest floor, running past - Fork Media (ZapSplat)
